title: Rational molecular design of electrolyte additive endows stable cycling performance of cobalt-free 5 V-class lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03280B, Paper
Wen-hui Hou, Yu Ou, T.Y Zeng, Qingqing Feng, Qingbin Cao, Pan Zhou, Yingchun Xia, Xuan Song, Weili Zhang, Yang Lu, Shuaishuai Yan, Hangyu Zhou, Haiyu Zhou, Hao Liu, Fengxiang Liu, Kai Liu
Ultrahigh-voltage lithium metal batteries based on cobalt-free LiNi0.5Mn1.5O4 (LNMO) cathode (5 V-class, vs. Li+/Li) and lithium metal anode (-3.04 V vs. the standard hydrogen electrode) have attracted extensive attention in...
